properties.name: spring.jackson.write-xml-declaration
properties.description: Feature that controls whether XML declaration should be written before when generator is initialized (true) or not (false).

properties.name: spring.jackson.default-empty
properties.description: Feature that controls whether null should be serialize as empty.

properties.name: app.jackson.mix-in-annotation.basePackages
properties.description: specifying the packages to scan for mixIn annotation.

properties.name: app.web.wrap.enable
properties.description: 响应结果是否包一层{"data":52,"message":"","status":"200"}样式的格式.
